content: *these crocheted baskets are the perfect place to keep things from car keys to clay planters make them in every size and color in lily sugar n cream yarnspirations * --- *skill level * easy --- **materials ** lily® sugar n cream® 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m yellow 00010 tangerine 01699 or hot green 01712 * small *2 balls or 140 yds/128 m* * medium *3 balls or 260 yds/240 m* *additional materials * stitch marker ---
